index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF LICENSES AND CONSUMER AFFAIRS
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the regulation of for-hire vehicles and amending Sections 2, 2i, 3, 3-A, 5, 6, 9, 10, 13, 14, 14-a, and 26 of Ordinance 59866 to transfer certain functions from the City Council and City Comptroller to the Director of Licenses and Consumer Affairs.
